law.text: Each budget unit shall maintain a current inventory of equipment having an original cost of five hundred dollars ($500) or more. The inventory shall be available for examination by the Finance and Administration Cabinet at all times.
law.history: Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 20, effective May 30, 1997. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 1, effective July 15 1988. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 450, sec. 40, effective July 1, 1983.
